sentences.zh: 王者制事立法，物度軌則，壹稟於六律，六律為萬事根本焉。

translations.literal: Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, all receive from six pitches, six pitches are ten thousand affairs root.
Kings establish affairs make laws, things measure tracks rules, all receive from six pitches, six pitches are ten thousand affairs root.

sentences.zh: 其於兵械尤所重，故云「望敵知吉凶，聞聲效勝負」，百王不易之道也。

translations.literal: Their regard for weapons especially heavy, thus said 'look at enemy know good bad, hear sound know victory defeat', hundred kings unchanging way.
Their regard for weapons especially heavy, thus said 'look at enemy know good bad, hear sound know victory defeat', hundred kings unchanging way.

sentences.zh: 武王伐紂，吹律聽聲，推孟春以至于季冬，殺氣相并，而音尚宮。

translations.literal: Wu Wang attacked Zhou, blew pitches listened to sound, pushed first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually combined, sound still gong.

sentences.zh: 同聲相從，物之自然，何足怪哉？

translations.literal: Same sound mutually follow, things' natural, what sufficient to wonder?

Wu Wang attacked Zhou, blew pitches listened to sound, pushed first spring to last winter, killing qi mutually combined, sound still gong. Same sound mutually follow, things' natural, what sufficient to wonder?

sentences.zh: 兵者，聖人所以討彊暴，平亂世，夷險阻，救危殆。

translations.literal: Warriors, sages use to punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangers obstacles, save peril crisis.

sentences.zh: 自含（血）［齒］戴角之獸見犯則校，而況於人懷好惡喜怒之氣？

translations.literal: From containing teeth wearing horns beasts see violation then fight, moreover concerning people harboring likes dislikes happy angry qi?

sentences.zh: 喜則愛心生，怒則毒螫加，情性之理也。

translations.literal: Happy then loving heart born, angry then poisonous sting added, feelings nature's principle.

Warriors, sages use to punish strong violent, pacify chaotic age, level dangers obstacles, save peril crisis. From containing teeth wearing horns beasts see violation then fight, moreover concerning people harboring likes dislikes happy angry qi? Happy then loving heart born, angry then poisonous sting added, feelings nature's principle.

sentences.zh: 昔黃帝有涿鹿之戰，以定火災；

translations.literal: Former Huang Di had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster;

sentences.zh: 顓頊有共工之陳，以平水害；

translations.literal: Zhuan Xu had Gong Gong battle array, to pacify water harm;

sentences.zh: 成湯有南巢之伐，以殄夏亂。

translations.literal: Cheng Tang had Nan Chao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos.

sentences.zh: 遞興遞廢，勝者用事，所受於天也。

translations.literal: Successively rise successively waste, victors use affairs, received from heaven.

Former Huang Di had Zhuolu battle, to settle fire disaster; Zhuan Xu had Gong Gong battle array, to pacify water harm; Cheng Tang had Nan Chao attack, to exterminate Xia chaos. Successively rise successively waste, victors use affairs, received from heaven.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，名士迭興，晉用咎犯，而齊用王子，吳用孫武，申明軍約，賞罰必信，卒伯諸侯，兼列邦土，雖不及三代之誥誓，然身寵君尊，當世顯揚，可不謂榮焉？

translations.literal: From this after, famous scholars successively rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declared army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, finally hegemon feudal lords, annexed column state lands, though not reach three dynasties' announcements oaths, yet body honored lord respected, contemporary illustrious praised, can not call glorious?

sentences.zh: 豈與世儒闇於大較，不權輕重，猥云德化，不當用兵，大至君辱失守，小乃侵犯削弱，遂執不移等哉！

translations.literal: How with worldly Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, vile speak virtue transformation, not appropriate use troops, great to lord insulted lost defense, small then invaded diminished weakened, then held not move etc!

sentences.zh: 笔教笞不可廢於家，刑罰不可捐於國，誅伐不可偃於天下，用之有巧拙，行之有逆順耳。

translations.literal: Writing teaching cane cannot waste in home, punishments cannot abandon in state, executions cannot cease in world, use has skillful clumsy, carry has reverse proper only.

From this after, famous scholars successively rise, Jin used Jiu Fan, Qi used Wang Zi, Wu used Sun Wu, declared army covenants, rewards punishments must trustworthy, finally hegemon feudal lords, annexed column state lands, though not reach three dynasties' announcements oaths, yet body honored lord respected, contemporary illustrious praised, can not call glorious? How with worldly Confucians dark about great outline, not weigh light heavy, vile speak virtue transformation, not appropriate use troops, great to lord insulted lost defense, small then invaded diminished weakened, then held not move etc! Writing teaching cane cannot waste in home, punishments cannot abandon in state, executions cannot cease in world, use has skillful clumsy, carry has reverse proper only.

sentences.zh: 夏桀、殷紂手搏豺狼，足追四馬，勇非微也；

translations.literal: Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled wolves boars, feet pursued four horses, brave not slight;

sentences.zh: 百戰克勝，諸侯懾服，權非輕也。

translations.literal: Hundred battles victorious, feudal lords awed submitted, power not light.

sentences.zh: 秦二世宿軍無用之地，連兵於邊陲，力非弱也；

translations.literal: Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops useless places, connected troops at borders, strength not weak;

sentences.zh: 結怨匈奴，絓禍於越，勢非寡也。

translations.literal: Tied resentment Xiongnu, entangled calamity Yue, momentum not few.

sentences.zh: 及其威盡勢極，閭巷之人為敵國，咎生窮武之不知足，甘得之心不息也。

translations.literal: When authority exhausted momentum extreme, alley people became enemy state, fault born from martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not rest.

Xia Jie, Yin Zhou hand wrestled wolves boars, feet pursued four horses, brave not slight; Hundred battles victorious, feudal lords awed submitted, power not light. Qin Er Shi garrisoned troops useless places, connected troops at borders, strength not weak; Tied resentment Xiongnu, entangled calamity Yue, momentum not few. When authority exhausted momentum extreme, alley people became enemy state, fault born from martial not knowing sufficiency, sweet gain heart not rest.

sentences.zh: 高祖有天下，三邊外畔；

translations.literal: Gao Zu had world, three borders outside rebelled;

sentences.zh: 大國之王雖稱蕃輔，臣節未盡。

translations.literal: Great states' kings though called auxiliary support, minister conduct not complete.

sentences.zh: 會高祖厭苦軍事，亦有蕭、張之謀，故偃武一休息，羈縻不備。

translations.literal: Met Gao Zu weary bitter military affairs, also had Xiao Zhang plans, thus ceased martial one rest, restrained not prepared.

Gao Zu had world, three borders outside rebelled; Great states' kings though called auxiliary support, minister conduct not complete. Met Gao Zu weary bitter military affairs, also had Xiao Zhang plans, thus ceased martial one rest, restrained not prepared.

sentences.zh: 歷至孝文即位，將軍陳武等議曰：「南越、朝鮮自全秦時內屬為臣子，後且擁兵阻阸，選蠕觀望。

translations.literal: Continued to Xiao Wen ascended throne, generals Chen Wu etc discussed: 'Nan Yue, Chao Xian from complete Qin time inner belonged as minister children, after moreover held troops blocked passes, wriggling watching.

sentences.zh: 高祖時天下新定，人民小安，未可復興兵。

translations.literal: Gao Zu time world newly settled, people small peaceful, not could again raise troops.

sentences.zh: 今陛下仁惠撫百姓，恩澤加海內，宜及士民樂用，征討逆黨，以一封疆。」

translations.literal: Now Your Majesty benevolent gracious caressed hundred families, favor moisture added within seas, appropriate reach scholar people happy use, attack rebellious parties, to unify borders.'

sentences.zh: 孝文曰：「朕能任衣冠，念不到此。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear robe hat, thought not reach this.

sentences.zh: 會呂氏之亂，功臣宗室共不羞恥，誤居正位，常戰戰慄慄，恐事之不終。

translations.literal: Met Lu clan chaos, merit ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling trembling, feared affairs not end.

sentences.zh: 且兵凶器，雖克所願，動亦秏病，謂百姓遠方何？

translations.literal: Moreover troops ominous instruments, though conquer wished, move also exhaust illness, say hundred families far places what?

sentences.zh: 又先帝知勞民不可煩，故不以為意。

translations.literal: Also former emperor knew toil people cannot trouble, thus not took as intent.

sentences.zh: 朕豈自謂能？

translations.literal: I how self say able?

sentences.zh: 今匈奴內侵，軍吏無功，邊民父子荷兵日久，朕常為動心傷痛，無日忘之。

translations.literal: Now Xiongnu inner invade, army officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget.

sentences.zh: 今未能銷距，願且堅邊設候，結和通使，休寧北陲，為功多矣。

translations.literal: Now not able dissolve defense, wish moreover strengthen borders set scouts, tie peace connect envoys, rest peaceful north borders, for merit many.

sentences.zh: 且無議軍。」

translations.literal: Moreover no discuss troops.'

sentences.zh: 故百姓無內外之繇，得息肩於田畝，天下殷富，粟至十餘錢，鳴雞吠狗，煙火萬里，可謂和樂者乎！

translations.literal: Thus hundred families no inner outer corvee, got rest shoulders at fields, world prosperous rich, grain to ten plus cash, crowing cocks barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy!

Continued to Xiao Wen ascended throne, generals Chen Wu etc discussed: 'Nan Yue, Chao Xian from complete Qin time inner belonged as minister children, after moreover held troops blocked passes, wriggling watching. Gao Zu time world newly settled, people small peaceful, not could again raise troops. Now Your Majesty benevolent gracious caressed hundred families, favor moisture added within seas, appropriate reach scholar people happy use, attack rebellious parties, to unify borders.' Xiao Wen said: 'I can bear robe hat, thought not reach this. Met Lu clan chaos, merit ministers clan relatives together not ashamed, wrongly occupied correct positions, constantly trembling trembling, feared affairs not end. Moreover troops ominous instruments, though conquer wished, move also exhaust illness, say hundred families far places what? Also former emperor knew toil people cannot trouble, thus not took as intent. I how self say able? Now Xiongnu inner invade, army officials no merit, border people fathers sons carry weapons days long, I constantly for moved heart pained, no day forget. Now not able dissolve defense, wish moreover strengthen borders set scouts, tie peace connect envoys, rest peaceful north borders, for merit many. Moreover no discuss troops.' Thus hundred families no inner outer corvee, got rest shoulders at fields, world prosperous rich, grain to ten plus cash, crowing cocks barking dogs, smoke fires ten thousand li, can call harmonious happy!

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：文帝時，會天下新去湯火，人民樂業，因其欲然，能不擾亂，故百姓遂安。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Wen emperor time, met world newly left cauldrons fires, people happy occupations, followed their wish thus, could not disturb chaos, thus hundred families then peaceful.

sentences.zh: 自年六七十翁亦未嘗至市井，游敖嬉戲如小兒狀。

translations.literal: From age sixty seventy old men also not tasted to market wells, roam play frolic like children appearance.

sentences.zh: 孔子所稱有德君子者邪！

translations.literal: Confucius called virtuous gentleman ones!

Grand Historian says: Wen emperor time, met world newly left cauldrons fires, people happy occupations, followed their wish thus, could not disturb chaos, thus hundred families then peaceful. From age sixty seventy old men also not tasted to market wells, roam play frolic like children appearance. Confucius called virtuous gentleman ones!

sentences.zh: 《書》曰［七正］，二十八舍。

translations.literal: Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodges.

sentences.zh: 律歷，天所以通五行八正之氣，天所以成孰萬物也。

translations.literal: Pitch calendar, heaven thus connects five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus completes ripens ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 舍者，日月所舍。

translations.literal: Lodges, sun moon lodged.

sentences.zh: 舍者，舒氣也。

translations.literal: Lodges, loose qi.

Book says seven correct, twenty eight lodges. Pitch calendar, heaven thus connects five phases eight correct qi, heaven thus completes ripens ten thousand things. Lodges, sun moon lodged. Lodges, loose qi.

translations.literal: Not Zhou wind dwells northwest, governs killing birth.

sentences.zh: 東壁居不周風東，主辟生氣而東之。

translations.literal: Dong Bi dwells Not Zhou wind east, governs open birth qi east it.

sentences.zh: 至於營室。

translations.literal: To Ying Shi.

sentences.zh: 營室者，主營胎陽氣而產之。

translations.literal: Ying Shi, governs camp fetal yang qi produce it.

sentences.zh: 東至于危。

translations.literal: East to Wei.

sentences.zh: 危，垝也。

translations.literal: Wei, wei.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣之（危）垝，故曰危。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi wei wei, thus called Wei.

sentences.zh: 十月也，律中應鐘。

translations.literal: Tenth month, pitch middle Ying Zhong.

sentences.zh: 應鐘者，陽氣之應，不用事也。

translations.literal: Ying Zhong, yang qi response, not use affairs.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為亥。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Hai.

sentences.zh: 亥者，該也。

translations.literal: Hai, contain.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣藏於下，故該也。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi store at below, thus contain.

translations.literal: Guang Mo wind dwells north.

sentences.zh: 廣莫者，言陽氣在下，陰莫陽廣大也，故曰廣莫。

translations.literal: Guang Mo, speak yang qi at below, yin cannot yang vast great, thus Guang Mo.

sentences.zh: 東至於虛。

translations.literal: East to Xu.

sentences.zh: 虛者，能實能虛，言陽氣冬則宛藏於虛，日冬至則一陰下藏，一陽上舒，故曰虛。

translations.literal: Xu, able solid able empty, speak yang qi winter then curl store at xu, winter solstice then one yin below store, one yang above stretch, thus Xu.

sentences.zh: 東至于須女。

translations.literal: East to Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 言萬物變動其所，陰陽氣未相離，尚相［如］胥［如］也，故曰須女。

translations.literal: Speak ten thousand things change their place, yin yang qi not yet separate, still mutually like xu like, thus Xu Nu.

sentences.zh: 十一月也，律中黃鐘。

translations.literal: Eleventh month, pitch middle Huang Zhong.

sentences.zh: 黃鐘者，陽氣踵黃泉而出也。

translations.literal: Huang Zhong, yang qi follow yellow springs exit.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為子。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Zi.

sentences.zh: 子者，滋也；

translations.literal: Zi, nourish;

sentences.zh: 滋者，言萬物滋於下也。

translations.literal: Nourish, speak ten thousand things nourish at below.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為壬癸。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers for Ren Gui.

sentences.zh: 壬之為言任也，言陽氣任養萬物於下也。

translations.literal: Ren speak, Ren, speak yang qi Ren nourish ten thousand things at below.

sentences.zh: 癸之為言揆也，言萬物可揆度，故曰癸。

translations.literal: Gui speak, Kui, speak ten thousand things can Kui measure, thus Gui.

sentences.zh: 東至牽牛。

translations.literal: East to Qian Niu.

sentences.zh: 牽牛者，言陽氣牽引萬物出之也。

translations.literal: Qian Niu, speak yang qi qian lead ten thousand things exit them.

sentences.zh: 牛者，冒也，言地雖凍，能冒而生也。

translations.literal: Niu, cover, speak earth though freeze, able cover born.

sentences.zh: 牛者，耕植種萬物也。

translations.literal: Niu, plow plant sow ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 東至於建星。

translations.literal: East to Jian Xing.

sentences.zh: 建星者，建諸生也。

translations.literal: Jian Xing, jian various born.

sentences.zh: 十二月也，律中大呂。

translations.literal: Twelfth month, pitch middle Da Lu.

sentences.zh: 大呂者。

translations.literal: Da Lu.

translations.literal: Tiao wind dwells northeast, governs exit ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 條之言條治萬物而出之，故曰條風。

sentences.zh: 南至於箕。

translations.literal: South to Ji.

sentences.zh: 箕者，言萬物根棋，故曰箕。

sentences.zh: 泰蔟者，言萬物蔟生也，故曰泰蔟。

sentences.zh: 寅言萬物始生螾然也，故曰寅。

sentences.zh: 南至於尾，言萬物始生如尾也。

translations.literal: Ming Shu wind dwells east.

sentences.zh: 明庶者，明眾物盡出也。

translations.literal: Ming Shu, bright many things all exit.

sentences.zh: 二月也，律中夾鐘。

translations.literal: Second month, pitch middle Jia Zhong.

sentences.zh: 夾鐘者，言陰陽相夾廁也。

translations.literal: Jia Zhong, speak yin yang mutually jia mix.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為卯。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Mao.

sentences.zh: 卯之為言茂也，言萬物茂也。

sentences.zh: 清明風居東南維，主風吹萬物而西之。

translations.literal: Qing Ming wind dwells southeast corner, governs wind blow ten thousand things west them.

sentences.zh: ［至於］軫。

translations.literal: To Zhen.

sentences.zh: 軫者，言萬物益大而軫軫然。

translations.literal: Zhen, speak ten thousand things increase big zhen zhen thus.

sentences.zh: 西至於翼。

translations.literal: West to Yi.

sentences.zh: 翼者，言萬物皆有羽翼也。

translations.literal: Yi, speak ten thousand things all have feather wings.

sentences.zh: 四月也，律中中呂。

translations.literal: Fourth month, pitch middle Zhong Lu.

sentences.zh: 中呂者，言萬物盡旅而西行也。

translations.literal: Zhong Lu, speak ten thousand things all travel west go.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為巳。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Si.

sentences.zh: 巳者，言陽氣之已盡也。

translations.literal: Si, speak yang qi already exhausted.

sentences.zh: 西至于七星。

translations.literal: West to Seven Stars.

sentences.zh: 七星者，陽數成於七，故曰七星。

translations.literal: Seven Stars, yang number complete at seven, thus called Seven Stars.

sentences.zh: 西至于張。

translations.literal: West to Zhang.

sentences.zh: 張者，言萬物皆張也。

translations.literal: Zhang, speak ten thousand things all stretch.

sentences.zh: 西至于注。

translations.literal: West to Zhu.

sentences.zh: 注者，言萬物之始衰，陽氣下注，故曰注。

translations.literal: Zhu, speak ten thousand things beginning decline, yang qi down zhu, thus called Zhu.

sentences.zh: 五月也，律中蕤賓。

translations.literal: Fifth month, pitch middle Rui Bin.

sentences.zh: 蕤賓者，言陰氣幼少，故曰蕤；

translations.literal: Rui Bin, speak yin qi young few, thus rui;

sentences.zh: 痿陽不用事，故曰賓。

translations.literal: Wei yang not use affairs, thus bin.

Qing Ming wind dwells southeast corner, governs wind blow ten thousand things west them. To Zhen. Zhen, speak ten thousand things increase big zhen zhen thus. West to Yi. Yi, speak ten thousand things all have feather wings. Fourth month, pitch middle Zhong Lu. Zhong Lu, speak ten thousand things all travel west go. Its at twelve branches for Si. Si, speak yang qi already exhausted. West to Seven Stars. Seven Stars, yang number complete at seven, thus called Seven Stars. West to Zhang. Zhang, speak ten thousand things all stretch. West to Zhu. Zhu, speak ten thousand things beginning decline, yang qi down zhu, thus called Zhu. Fifth month, pitch middle Rui Bin. Rui Bin, speak yin qi young few, thus rui; Wei yang not use affairs, thus bin.

sentences.zh: 景風居南方。

translations.literal: Jing wind dwells south.

sentences.zh: 景者，言陽氣道竟，故曰景風。

translations.literal: Jing, speak yang qi way end, thus Jing wind.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為午。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Wu.

sentences.zh: 午者，陰陽交，故曰午。

translations.literal: Wu, yin yang intersect, thus Wu.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為丙丁。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers for Bing Ding.

sentences.zh: 丙者，言陽道著明，故曰丙；

translations.literal: Bing, speak yang way manifest bright, thus Bing;

sentences.zh: 丁者，言萬物之丁壯也，故曰丁。

translations.literal: Ding, speak ten thousand things ding strong, thus Ding.

sentences.zh: 西至于弧。

translations.literal: West to Hu.

sentences.zh: 弧者，言萬物之吳落且就死也。

translations.literal: Hu, speak ten thousand things wu fall and approach death.

sentences.zh: 西至于狼。

translations.literal: West to Lang.

sentences.zh: 狼者，言萬物可度量，斷萬物，故曰狼。

translations.literal: Lang, speak ten thousand things can measure, cut ten thousand things, thus Lang.

Jing wind dwells south. Jing, speak yang qi way end, thus Jing wind. Its at twelve branches for Wu. Wu, yin yang intersect, thus Wu. Its at ten mothers for Bing Ding. Bing, speak yang way manifest bright, thus Bing; Ding, speak ten thousand things ding strong, thus Ding. West to Hu. Hu, speak ten thousand things wu fall and approach death. West to Lang. Lang, speak ten thousand things can measure, cut ten thousand things, thus Lang.

sentences.zh: 涼風居西南維，主地。

translations.literal: Liang wind dwells southwest corner, governs earth.

sentences.zh: 地者，沈奪萬物氣也。

translations.literal: Earth, sink seize ten thousand things qi.

sentences.zh: 六月也，律中林鐘。

translations.literal: Sixth month, pitch middle Lin Zhong.

sentences.zh: 林鐘者，言萬物就死氣林林然。

translations.literal: Lin Zhong, speak ten thousand things approach death qi lin lin thus.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為未。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Wei.

sentences.zh: 未者，言萬物皆成，有滋味也。

translations.literal: Wei, speak ten thousand things all complete, have flavors.

sentences.zh: 北至於罰。

translations.literal: North to Fa.

sentences.zh: 罰者，言萬物氣奪可伐也。

translations.literal: Fa, speak ten thousand things qi seize can attack.

sentences.zh: 北至於參。

translations.literal: North to Shen.

sentences.zh: 參言萬物可參也，故曰參。

translations.literal: Shen speak ten thousand things can shen, thus Shen.

sentences.zh: 七月也，律中夷則。

translations.literal: Seventh month, pitch middle Yi Ze.

sentences.zh: 夷則，言陰氣之賊萬物也。

translations.literal: Yi Ze, speak yin qi harm ten thousand things.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為申。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Shen.

sentences.zh: 申者，言陰用事，申賊萬物，故曰申。

translations.literal: Shen, speak yin use affairs, shen harm ten thousand things, thus Shen.

sentences.zh: 北至於濁。

translations.literal: North to Zhu.

sentences.zh: 濁者，觸也，言萬物皆觸死也，故曰濁。

translations.literal: Zhu, touch, speak ten thousand things all touch death, thus Zhu.

sentences.zh: 北至於留。

translations.literal: North to Liu.

sentences.zh: 留者，言陽氣之稽留也，故曰留。

translations.literal: Liu, speak yang qi detain stay, thus Liu.

sentences.zh: 八月也，律中南呂。

translations.literal: Eighth month, pitch middle Nan Lu.

sentences.zh: 南呂者，言陽氣之旅入藏也。

translations.literal: Nan Lu, speak yang qi travel enter store.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為酉。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for You.

sentences.zh: 酉者，萬物之老也，故曰酉。

translations.literal: You, ten thousand things old, thus You.

sentences.zh: 閶闔風居西方。

translations.literal: Chang He wind dwells west.

sentences.zh: 閶者，倡也；

translations.literal: Chang, lead;

sentences.zh: 闔者，藏也。

translations.literal: He, store.

sentences.zh: 言陽氣道萬物，闔黃泉也。

translations.literal: Speak yang qi exhaust ten thousand things, he yellow springs.

sentences.zh: 其於十母為庚辛。

translations.literal: Its at ten mothers for Geng Xin.

sentences.zh: 庚者，言陰氣庚萬物，故曰庚；

translations.literal: Geng, speak yin qi geng ten thousand things, thus Geng;

sentences.zh: 辛者，言萬物之辛生，故曰辛。

translations.literal: Xin, speak ten thousand things xin born, thus Xin.

sentences.zh: 北至於胃。

translations.literal: North to Wei.

sentences.zh: 胃者，言陽氣就藏，皆胃胃也。

translations.literal: Wei, speak yang qi approach store, all wei wei.

sentences.zh: 北至於婁。

translations.literal: North to Lou.

sentences.zh: 婁者，呼萬物且內之也。

translations.literal: Lou, call ten thousand things and inner them.

sentences.zh: 北至於奎。

translations.literal: North to Kui.

sentences.zh: 奎者，主毒螫殺萬物也，奎而藏之。

translations.literal: Kui, govern poison sting kill ten thousand things, Kui and store them.

sentences.zh: 九月也，律中無射。

translations.literal: Ninth month, pitch middle Wu She.

sentences.zh: 無射者，陰氣盛用事，陽氣無餘也，故曰無射。

translations.literal: Wu She, yin qi flourish use affairs, yang qi no remainder, thus Wu She.

sentences.zh: 其於十二子為戌。

translations.literal: Its at twelve branches for Xu.

sentences.zh: 戌者，言萬物盡滅，故曰戌。

translations.literal: Xu, speak ten thousand things all extinguish, thus Xu.

Chang He wind dwells west. Chang, lead; He, store. Speak yang qi exhaust ten thousand things, he yellow springs. Its at ten mothers for Geng Xin. Geng, speak yin qi geng ten thousand things, thus Geng; Xin, speak ten thousand things xin born, thus Xin. North to Wei. Wei, speak yang qi approach store, all wei wei. North to Lou. Lou, call ten thousand things and inner them. North to Kui. Kui, govern poison sting kill ten thousand things, Kui and store them. Ninth month, pitch middle Wu She. sentences.zh: 律數：九九八十一以為宮。

translations.literal: Pitch numbers: nine nine eighty one as gong.

sentences.zh: 三分去一，五十四以為徵。

translations.literal: Divide three remove one, fifty four as zhi.

sentences.zh: 三分益一，七十二以為商。

translations.literal: Divide three add one, seventy two as shang.

sentences.zh: 三分去一，四十八以為羽。

translations.literal: Divide three remove one, forty eight as yu.

sentences.zh: 三分益一，六十四以為角。

translations.literal: Divide three add one, sixty four as jue.

sentences.zh: 黃鐘長八寸七分一，宮。

translations.literal: Huang Zhong length eight cun seven fen one, gong.

sentences.zh: 大呂長七寸五分三分（一）［二］。

translations.literal: Da Lu length seven cun five fen three two.

sentences.zh: 太蔟長七寸（七）［十］分二，角。

translations.literal: Tai Cu length seven cun ten fen two, jue.

sentences.zh: 夾鐘長六寸（一）［七］分三分一。

translations.literal: Jia Zhong length six cun seven fen three one.

sentences.zh: 姑洗長六寸（七）［十］分四，羽。

translations.literal: Gu Xi length six cun ten fen four, yu.

sentences.zh: 仲呂長五寸九分三分二，徵。

translations.literal: Zhong Lu length five cun nine fen three two, zhi.

sentences.zh: 蕤賓長五寸六分三分（一）［二］。

translations.literal: Rui Bin length five cun six fen three two.

sentences.zh: 林鐘長五寸（七）［十］分四，角。

translations.literal: Lin Zhong length five cun ten fen four, jue.

sentences.zh: 夷則長五寸［四分］三分二，商。

translations.literal: Yi Ze length five cun four fen three two, shang.

sentences.zh: 南呂長四寸（七）［十］分八，徵。

translations.literal: Nan Lu length four cun ten fen eight, zhi.

sentences.zh: 無射長四寸四分三分二。

translations.literal: Wu She length four cun four fen three two.

sentences.zh: 應鐘長四寸二分三分二，羽。

translations.literal: Ying Zhong length four cun two fen three two, yu.

sentences.zh: 生鐘分：子一分。

translations.literal: Born bell divisions: Zi one fen.

sentences.zh: 丑三分二。

translations.literal: Chou three fen two.

sentences.zh: 寅九分八。

translations.literal: Yin nine fen eight.

sentences.zh: 卯二十七分十六。

translations.literal: Mao twenty seven fen sixteen.

sentences.zh: 辰八十一分六十四。

translations.literal: Chen eighty one fen sixty four.

sentences.zh: 巳二百四十三分一百二十八。

translations.literal: Si two hundred forty three fen one hundred twenty eight.

sentences.zh: 午七百二十九分五百一十二。

translations.literal: Wu seven hundred twenty nine fen five hundred twelve.

sentences.zh: 未二千一百八十七分一千二十四。

translations.literal: Wei two thousand one hundred eighty seven fen one thousand twenty four.

sentences.zh: 申六千五百六十一分四千九十六。

translations.literal: Shen six thousand five hundred sixty one fen four thousand ninety six.

sentences.zh: 酉一萬九千六百八十三分八千一百九十二。

translations.literal: You nineteen thousand six hundred eighty three fen eight thousand one hundred ninety two.

sentences.zh: 戌五萬九千四十九分三萬二千七百六十八。

translations.literal: Xu fifty nine thousand forty nine fen thirty two thousand seven hundred sixty eight.

sentences.zh: 亥十七萬七千一百四十七分六萬五千五百三十六。

translations.literal: Hai one hundred seventy seven thousand one hundred forty seven fen sixty five thousand five hundred thirty six.

sentences.zh: 生黃鐘術曰：以下生者，倍其實，三其法。

translations.literal: Generate Huang Zhong method says: below generate, double its solid, triple its law.

sentences.zh: 以上生者，四其實，三其法。

translations.literal: Above generate, four its solid, three its law.

sentences.zh: 上九，商八，羽七，角六，宮五，徵九。

translations.literal: Shang nine, shang eight, yu seven, jue six, gong five, zhi nine.

sentences.zh: 置一而九三之以為法。

translations.literal: Place one and nine three it as method.

sentences.zh: 實如法，得長一寸。

translations.literal: Solid like method, get length one cun.

sentences.zh: 凡得九寸，命曰「黃鐘之宮」。

translations.literal: All get nine cun, name called Huang Zhong gong.

sentences.zh: 故曰音始於宮，窮於角；

translations.literal: Thus sound begins gong, exhausts jue;

sentences.zh: 數始於一，終於十，成於三；

translations.literal: Numbers begin one, end ten, complete three;

sentences.zh: 氣始於冬至，周而復生。

translations.literal: Qi begins winter solstice, circles return born.

Each according its bell diameter inspect with stopped fen make it. Qi begins winter solstice, circle return born.

sentences.zh: 神生於無，形成於有，形然後數，形而成聲，故曰神使氣，氣就形。

translations.literal: Spirit born from nothing, form formed from something, form then numbers, form then sound, thus spirit makes qi, qi goes to form.

sentences.zh: 形理如類有可類。

translations.literal: Form principle like category has can category.

sentences.zh: 或未形而未類，或同形而同類，類而可班，類而可識。

translations.literal: Some not yet form not yet category, some same form same category, category can rank, category can identify.

sentences.zh: 聖人知天地識之別，故從有以至未有，以得細若氣，微若聲。

translations.literal: Sage know heaven earth know distinction, thus from have reach not have, with get fine like qi, subtle like sound.

sentences.zh: 然聖人因神而存之，雖妙必效情，核其華道者明矣。

translations.literal: Yet sage according spirit store it, though wonderful must effect feelings, examine its flower way clear.

sentences.zh: 非有聖心以乘聰明，孰能存天地之神而成形之情哉？

translations.literal: Not have sage heart to ride intelligence, who can store heaven earth spirit and complete form feelings?

sentences.zh: 神者，物受之而不能知（及）其去來，故聖人畏而欲存之。

translations.literal: Spirit, things receive it cannot know its go come, thus sage fear desire store it.

sentences.zh: 唯欲存之，神之亦存。

translations.literal: Only desire store it, spirit it also store.

sentences.zh: 其欲存之者，故莫貴焉。

translations.literal: Its desire store it, thus nothing noble than this.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：（故）［在］旋璣玉衡以齊七政，即天地二十八宿。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: With Xuan Ji Yu Heng align seven govern, then heaven earth twenty eight lodges.

sentences.zh: 十母，十二子，鐘律調自上古。

translations.literal: Ten mothers, twelve children, bells pitches tune from ancient times.

sentences.zh: 建律運歷造日度，可據而度也。

translations.literal: Build pitches transport calendar make day degrees, can according measure.

sentences.zh: 合符節，通道德，即從斯之謂也。

translations.literal: Combine tallies sections, connect morality way, then from this called.

Grand Historian says: In Xuan Ji Yu Heng to align seven govern, then heaven earth twenty eight lodges. Weigh thus level light heavy. Build pitch transport calendar make day degree, can according measure. Combine tally sections, connect morality way, then from this called.
